simple log - linear model.from sentence: We develop a simple log - linear model , in the spirit of traditional web - based QA systems , that answers questions by querying the web and extracting the answer from returned web snippets .

our evaluation scheme.from sentence: Thus , our evaluation scheme is suitable for semantic parsing benchmarks in which the knowledge required for answering questions is covered by the web ( in contrast with virtual assitants for which the knowledge is specific to an application ) .
